name: pip - The Last Pinecone
description:
Story

As winter grows closer, the chance for a small pinecone to get planted is closing. Embark on a journey with Pip, the smallest and last pinecone to leave his tree. Help him find a place to plant himself before the cold of winter freezes the ground. 

Talk to your new friend along the way to help you become the next great tree!

Controls
  • Move - Arrow Keys & WASD

(This game is currently in-development.)

Created for the ❄️ Great Winter Game Jam - 2020  ❄️ Learn more about Firith Studio
